name: The Witch Mark
description:
The witch mark is a game initially created for a game competition with the medieval theme, the game tells a short story of 2 women Luana and Agnes accused of witchcraft by Scottish king James IV.

The game is a little story, in which you can control the character Luana, make choices and other actions.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to walk.

Use the mouse to interact.

Created by: Rodrigo souza

BluemoonGames

Music by: freesound.org
